title: Katthi Parvakkari Lyrics Aranmanai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Katthi Parvakkari
Singer(s): Karthik, Surmukhi
Movie: Aranmanai
Music: Bharadwaj

Kathi paarva kaari
un kannu rendum oosi
kuththi kuththi enna nee kolladhey..

Sondha oora pakka
nee vandhurukka mama
un kaiya vachu enna nee killadhey..

ada amaa amaa amaa
nee sonna ellam right uh..
thank u thank u oh my love
thank u thank u oh my love

Kannukettum dhooram ellam
eththana eththana sandhosam...
oh..kannuku ettum dhooram ellam
eththana eththana sandhosam...
kolusu katti odum nadhi
Â padudhadi kuyilattam..

A/C kaathu illatiyum
vepangathu sorgam thaan..
pizza burger illatiyum
sola koottu taste uh than..

ada ama ama ama
nee sonna ellam right uh..
thank u thank u oh my love
thank u thank u oh my love

Moochu vangum kaaththukulla
vandhu veesum poo vasam.
Pondhu kootil manjal maina
enna paththu thalaiyaattum

thatha paatti sonna kadhai
ellam namma nenjoda..
oora vittu ponalum thaan
usuru intha mannoda..

aandu nooru aana pinnum
sondha manna mithicha
sorgam vera edhu irukku....

ada ama ama ama
nee sonna ellam right uh..
thank u thank u oh my love....
thank u thank u oh my love....
